src:
Lo buscaban por un robo y le hallaron varias armas
06 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
A Nahuel "el Fleco" Jofré (23) habían ido a buscarlo porque estaba señalado por un robo ocurrido días atrás en una casa del Médano de Oro, en Rawson. Y si bien los policías no tuvieron suerte en esa causa, abrieron otra porque en su casa de la Villa San José, en Chimbas, hallaron un revólver calibre 32 con dos cartuchos del mismo calibre y dos armas de fabricación casera (tumberas) con tres cartuchos AT, dos de los cuales estaban sin percutar. Además, encontraron varias municiones calibre 36, 32, 22 y 9mm. El sujeto, que cuenta con varios antecedentes por robo, ahora será juzgado en el fuero de Flagrancia.
El operativo estuvo a cargo del subcomisario Julio Aballay.
text:
They were looking for him for a robbery and found several weapons
06 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
Nahuel "el Fleco" Jofré (23) had gone to look for him because he was indicated by a robbery that happened days ago at a house in the Médano de Oro, in Rawson. And while the policemen were not lucky in that cause, they opened another one because in their house in Villa San José, in Chimbas, they found a 32-caliber revolver with two cartridges of the same caliber and two homemade weapons (tumberas) with three cartridges AT, two of which were uncut. In addition, they found several 36, 32, 22 and 9mm caliber ammunition. The subject, who has several records for theft, will now be tried in the jurisdiction of Flagrancia.
The operation was in charge of Deputy Commissioner Julio Aballay.
